::Prowl/Zardus/Autofire::

IR's thoughts did little to stop Prowl as Iris's shots nailed him in
the shoulders. He was about to leap, but the the high-pitched noise
stopped him dead in his tracks. Prowl rises up on his back legs,
screeching from the sound.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus flies up, looking over at Rattrap to see what was going on. He
hadn't expected a Maximal to help him, so this was a bit of a
surprise. He watches the explosion, though Autofire was flying too
fast for it to have a major impact.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Autofire turns to strafe at Zardus again when the missile hits behind
him, enveloping him in flames. Shrapnel hits all over him, though his
armor holds through it. The turbulence causes him to go into a spin,
emerging from the fireball fairly charred and dented, but he had been
too far from the explosion to be taken out.

Seeing a large beast and a bot ahead of him, Autofire fires two
rapid-fire cannons, laser beams striking across Prowl's armor and also
heading at Iris.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Well, she'd got his attention at least.
> Iris backed up towards the CF, rifle shouldered and ready to fire
again.
> By now Prowl had noticed her and was charging, her mind quickly
going over 
> her armory to see if there was something that could do a better job
then the 
> gun.
> There was nothing.*
> 
> " Slag!"
> 
> * Firing off rapidly she aimed all she had at Prowl as he came
closer, 
> backing up towards the CF all the time.
> 
> From across the field IR saw the large form of Prowl moving towards
the 
> base, glancing over to see him moving towards a red armored
transformer.
> But that person looked familier so she stopped chargeing at Demon
Wulf and 
> narrowed her eyes.
> Who...Iris!
> < PROWL! NO!> She was trying to reach him with her mind, starting
off 
> towards him to try and get between his teeth and Iris.
> < Stop! Stop!>
> Why couldn't he listen?!
> She was at a full run, but even that couldn't save her friend from
the 
> monster that was moving towards her. IR already knew too late that
she 
> wouldn't reach her in time.
> But maybe she could stop Prowl another way, with the time.
> Linking with his she imagined a very high pitched sound, so high
that it 
> made her internal systems rattle, hoping that it was enough to
destract him 
> enough to slow him down.*
> 
> 
>
